definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 當等待植物生長時，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: Kay plays chess better than Paul.
sentences.chinese: 凱比比保羅下棋下得好。

sentences.english: In chess, the idea is to unzip your opponent.
sentences.chinese: 下棋的宗旨就是擊敗對手。

sentences.english: He initiated his son into the game of chess.
sentences.chinese: 他把下棋的初步知識教給兒子。

sentences.english: The moves in chess are not only manifold, but involute.
sentences.chinese: 下棋的走法不但多種多樣，而且錯綜複雜。

sentences.english: Children can sharpen their mental reflexes by learning to play chess.
sentences.chinese: 兒童學下棋可以進步靈活反響的本領。

sentences.english: We played chess to pass the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們下棋來打發晚上的時間。

sentences.english: A director general in the police bureau is playing chess with an old man.
sentences.chinese: 一位公安局長在茶館裏與一位老頭下棋。

sentences.english: You are really keen on playing chess.
sentences.chinese: 你們下棋的癮頭可真不小。

sentences.english: Chess, card-playing , and dancing are forms of indoor recreation enjoyed by many people.
sentences.chinese: 下棋，打牌和跳舞，是許多人喜歡的室內娛樂活動。

sentences.english: This paper discussed some problems in the structure design of manipulator of chess game playing robot.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了下棋機器人操作機結構設計中的一些問題。

sentences.english: Lin Tao plays chess very well, but he is not good at football.
sentences.chinese: 林濤下棋下得很好，可足球踢得不怎麼樣。

sentences.english: Although I was only eight, I liked watching them play.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我年僅八歲，但我喜歡看他們下棋。

sentences.english: In life unlike chess, the game continues after checkmate.
sentences.chinese: 生活不像下棋，突破後，仍在繼續。

sentences.english: This makes the game interesting for the player regardless of his skills in checkers.
sentences.chinese: 這讓對自己棋術沒自信的朋友也能享受下棋的樂趣。

sentences.english: The two white-haired old men are chessing under the tree.
sentences.chinese: 兩位白髮老人在樹下下棋。

definition: state of play in a game of chess/(old) chessboard
kifu (record of a game of go or shogi)
(fig.) to have a meeting with state security agents (to be warned to behave "responsibly")
draw or tie in chess etc/CL:盤|盘[pan2]
